ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine stood up and transformed back to his bot mode. I ll help if I can, what s the project and what do I have to do? He stepped toward Shadow Wing it

Lunarpine stood up and transformed back to his bot mode. "I'll help 
if I can, what's the project and what do I have to do?"

He stepped toward Shadow Wing it was nice to see that somebody 
appreciated his abilities.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She found the parts and the scanner she needed.  Now what to do 
with 
> it, she thought.  She wondered if hooking it up to a CR chamber 
would 
> do the trick.  She knew the CR restored the body and the DNA of a 
> bot's aminal side.  She wondered if it could change a bot's form as 
> well if the scanner was hooked up to it correctly.  She took the 
> scanner and was about to walk out of the bay when the idea struck 
> her. "Where am I going to find a wolf to scan?" She looked at the 
> scanner and sighed.  The only wolf around that she knew of was 
> Lunarpine.  "Well, so much for suprizing him.  I will need his help 
> anyway in order to get this to work anyway."  She carried the 
scanner 
> with her and walked back into the engine room.  She walked around 
the 
> bend and still saw Lunarpine laying there.
> 
> "Um, I hate to bother you like this, but I need your help on a big 
> project.  Would you be willing to help me?" She smiled. If this 
> worked, she would be a wolf and he would be happier with life.  At 
> least, that was her plan.
